EmailTemplate.name: Constant Aviation.Ovation Select_GlobalExpress.Ovation Select_GlobalExpress
EmailTemplate.subject: The Ovation Select Upgrade for Global Express is Finally Here
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
THE HAWKER 800/800XP ADS-B OUT SOLUTION BY TECHNICAIR
Meet the ADS-B Out 2020 mandate and get a solution designed to meet your aircraft's current configuration with the ADS-B Out solution for your Hawker 800/800XP available through Technicair.
Upgrade your Hawker 800/800XP with the help of Honeywell’s RM-855 program featuring the Primus II Radio and receive:
- Reduced separation and highly accurate departure and arrival times - Surveillance in areas that do not currently have radar coverage - A clear view of vehicles and runways in order to avoid collisions or delays - More efficient spacing and routing, inthe Gulf of Mexico, mountainous regions of Colorado and the lower altitudes of Alaska
Fly with confidence thanks to Technicair and Honeywell's Primus II Radio and ensure your future travel plans in 2020.
